content: this beginner friendly crochet coaster pattern will and some zing to any coffee table while preventing those annoying water marks the recommended materials is cotton yarn in 3 different colours but this pattern looks great in one single colour too your imagination is the only thing stopping you create these bold and bright crochet coasters - you can opt to use up to 9 different colours if you want to the fringing added to the coaster does more than just add some whimsical charm it means that your project wont need blocking and will be ready for use straight away making it the perfect gift for new homes ***pattern details*** - uk terms and us terms - file type 2 x pdf with links to youtube tutorials - page size a4 210mm x 297mm - language english - download will include 1 x colour pdf in uk terms and 1 x colour pdf in us terms - link to full video tutorial ***finished size*** one size - 5 inches by 3 5 inches excluding fringe ***materials needed*** dk/size 3 100% cotton - i used paintbox yarns simply cotton dk in the following 3 shades a - 462 - rosy pink b- 401 - paper white c -443 - tea rose 4mm crochet hook scissors don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com please do not copy or claim as your own you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer please do not sell the pdf if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2022
